ai-mil7.6.9:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors should be called by one a dragon?”
ai-mil7.6.9:1.3_0: In the same way, a one who lives in resorts to the wisdom where he develops the mind of wisdom. And he develops the characteristic of lazy and develops the noble cycle of insight.
ai-mil7.6.9:1.4_0: This is the first kind of ghee.
ai-mil7.6.9:2.1_0: Furthermore, an ghee is wandering in search of ghee.
ai-mil7.6.9:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator is engaged in bad conduct by way of speech and bad conduct,
ai-mil7.6.9:2.3_0: this is the second coal of ghee.
ai-mil7.6.9:3.1_0: Furthermore, when a person sees people, they think:
ai-mil7.6.9:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, the one who thinks, “Great king, the one who thinks, ‘I’ll get rid of thoughts.’ Then he should pull back and think, ‘I haven’t enjoyed a day.’
ai-mil7.6.9:3.3_0: This is the third kind of ghee.
ai-mil7.6.9:3.4_0: The Buddha has said these two friends:
ai-mil7.6.9:4.1_0: ‘Sister, you’re scared about a red liberating,
ai-mil7.6.9:4.3_0: But when one nights in darkness
ai-mil7.6.9:4.4_0: he says, “I won’t see it again.”
